live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39690.summary: Some customers in the areas of Mill Lake and McMillian in the city of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39690.title: Jul 16 - Abbotsford (Mill Lake and McMillian) | Service Interruption (Resolved)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39697.summary: Some customers in the Valhalla area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39697.title: July 16 – Winnipeg (Valhalla) | All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)

live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.https://outages.enmax.com/Portal/#
